extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    GameState used to save the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameState

        public GameState(java.util.List<Boat> allBoats,
                 PlayerBoat playerBoat,
                 java.util.List<CollisionObject> obstacles,
                 java.util.List<CollisionObject> powerups,
                 int legNumber,
                 boolean lastRun,
                 boolean isFinsihed,
                 long totalFrames)
        Create a GameState.
        Parameters:
        allBoats - the list of all boats from SceneMainGame
        playerBoat - the PlayerBoat object
        obstacles - the list of all obstacles in the race
        powerups - the list of all powerups in the race
        legNumber - the current leg number
        lastRun - true if it is the final leg, false otherwise
        isFinsihed - true if the race is finished, false otherwise
        totalFrames - number of frames elapsed since the start of the race
